About AboutActivity
This app gets scores for football matches in the Premier League, Serie A, Bundesliga, La Liga, and the UEFA Champions League. All match data is acquired from the football-data.org API. All team logos are acquired from http://hdlogo.wordpress.com/ upon requesting permission form the owner. The original version of this app was created by Yahia Khalid Ibn El Walid Ahmed, and a modified version is given to students in the Udacity Android Nanodegree program. To report any bugs,or suggestions do not hesitate to send a mail to y.k.ibnelwalid@gmail.com.
During the off season, fake data will be added to the app.
